You didn’t set up SRL in your main loop. Read the manual again.

item.title: Srl?
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

okay umm

program New;
{.include srl.scar}

const
cd1=5921634;// the color of the road


procedure tomine;
begin
setrun(true);
RoadWalktol(cd1,'s',12);
wait(100+random(300))
RoadWalktol(cd1,'s',12);
wait(100+random(300))
end;



begin
activateclient;
wait(100+random(100))
tomine;
end.

its just my begining script, i alway write mine and then found out where it ends up,
now when i run it though, it wont walk to the road(just logs out)
last time a worte a script it would do it, but now it wont…

Read full topic
